column1: #Text=Are Canadians the champions of self back-patting?
#Text=According to the article, Sweden has taken in 200, 000 refugees, Germany 1.5 million.
#Text=That's equivalent to 2% and 1.9% of their respective populations.
#Text=25,000 refugees, less 0.07% of the Canadian population.
#Text=So seriously, let's stop the boasting here.
